snippet.title: Baba Is You - release date trailer
snippet.description:
Baba Is You, a puzzle game about changing the rules, will be released March 13th on the Nintendo Switch™ as well as Windows, Mac & Linux!

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/736260/Baba_Is_You/
Official website: http://www.hempuli.com/baba/
News on Twitter: https://twitter.com/babaisyou_
Presskit: http://www.hempuli.com/press/sheet.php?p=Baba_Is_You

In Baba Is You, the rules that dictate how the game works are present in every level as movable blocks. By pushing them around, you alter the way the game works and cause surprising interactions, changing solid walls into passages, making water float in midair and even transforming objects into others!

Winner of the Excellence in Design and Best Student Game awards at Indie Games Festival 2018 and the IndieCade Europe Choice Award 2018. Winner of Nordic Game Jam 2017.

Made by Arvi Teikari
Porting by MP2 Games
Made using Multimedia Fusion 2 by Clickteam
